channel.title: A good place to autofight with SCAR
channel.description: I've found that the best place to autofight with SCAR is at the al-kharid warriors. It's good because their purple shirts are a distinct color. Post replies/what you think is the best autofighting place with SCAR.

item.title: A good place to autofight with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Nope you’re all wrong! Fight at the battlefield against either the warriors or the elves. Never anybody there!

Read full topic
item.source: A good place to autofight with SCAR

item.title: A good place to autofight with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

i say the best place is the goblin village casue no one goes there and also do it in a buzy world where no one will even think about going there i got my guy pure 70 str with aryan and got banned on the last day

Read full topic
item.source: A good place to autofight with SCAR

item.title: A good place to autofight with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Anywhere that there is no people is a good place, because there is no one to report you or to be in the way so it’s faster training.

Read full topic
item.source: A good place to autofight with SCAR
